description: The call forwarding settings for a phone number.

call_forwarding_enabled.description: Indicates if call forwarding will be enabled for this number if forwards_to and forwarding_type are filled in. Defaults to true for backwards compatibility with APIV1 use of numbers endpoints.

forwards_to.description: The phone number to which inbound calls to this number are forwarded. Inbound calls will not be forwarded if this field is left blank. If set, must be a +E.164-formatted phone number.

forwarding_type.description: Call forwarding type. 'forwards_to' must be set for this to have an effect.
